indicators.description: Population using hand-washing facilities with soap and water

indicators.description: Percentage of safely treated domestic wastewater flows

indicators.description: Deaths attributed to unsafe water, sanitation and hygiene services

indicators.description: Life expectancy at birth

indicators.description: Healthy life expectancy (HALE) at birth

indicators.description: Mortality rate for children under 5 years

indicators.description: Mortality rate for neonatal period (0-27 days)

indicators.description: Maternal deaths per 100,000 live births

indicators.description: Prevalence of overweight in children under 5

indicators.description: Prevalence of obesity (BMI ≥30) in adults

indicators.description: Prevalence of obesity in children ages 5-19
